title: How long have Lily Allen and David Harbour been dating as they confirm romance?
text:
Lily Allen and David Harbour have pretty much confirmed they are an item (Picture: MEGA)

Lily Allen and David Harbour have all but confirmed their romance after they were seen out and about in New York City together, packing on the PDA.

The pair have been setting the rumour mill alight for some time now, but their couple status was all but sealed after they were seen holding hands and sharing a kiss in Manhattan following the Stranger Things star’s Saturday Night Live hosting stint.

And it’s not the only time we’ve seen them in each other’s company of late, sparking rumours they were more than just friends – but just how long have they been together?

Here’s what you need to know…

How long have Lily Allen and David Harbour been dating?

We don’t know exactly how long the pair have been together, but they’ve kept us guessing since they were first spotted together in August.

That time, Lily and David were seen together in London’s West End watching The Lehman Trilogy at Piccadilly Theatre.

Lily and David were also spotted watching the boxing at the O2

They further fuelled speculation in September after they took the Tube together to the O2 in September to watch boxer Vasily Lomachenko’s match against Luke Campbell.

Lily was also in the audience last weekend when David hosted Saturday Night Live.

The Smile singer pretty much confirmed what we were all thinking then and there when she posted a snap of David’s set to Instagram, captioning it ‘Mine’.

Who were Lily and David previously dating?

She left us in no doubt as she shared an image of him on Saturday Night Live with this caption (Picture: Instagram)

Lily – who has two daughters, Ethel and Marnie, with ex-husband Sam Cooper – was most recently in a relationship with musician Meridian Dan, whom she split from late last year.

She admitted earlier this year that she was single for the first time in years, telling the How To Fail With Elizabeth Day podcast: ‘‘I’ve always had a boyfriend. I don’t at the moment, I’m single for the first time since I was about 15.’

Lily was previously in a relationship with musician Meridian Dan (Picture: Chris Jackson/Getty Images)

‘It’s just been bad news after bad news after bad news and I think that fact that I haven’t called him and been like, “Hey, wanna come around for a cuddle?” means that it’s big for me, because ordinarily, when things get difficult, I do need to have somebody around to share those problems.

David was previously with Fantastic Beasts star Alison Sudol (Picture: Getty Images)

‘So the fact that I’m dealing with it all on my own, I’m growing up.’

David was thought to have still been dating Fantastic Beasts actress Alison Sudol – but she shared a cryptic Instagram post in August about ‘letting go’.
